Gather.Say:
This is a notice about your bank of america checking account. We have noticed some fraudulent activity on your account. Your account was just charged for one hundred and twenty eight dollars and 28 cents at best buy in Phoenix Arizona.
for security reasons and so we can refund this charge we'll need to confirm your identity. please enter the verification code sent to you. when you're finished please press pound

Response.Say: We didn't receive any input. Goodbye!
